thag2.45:1.1_0: One should not suspend others from the Saṅgha, nor raise objections against them;
thag2.45:1.3_0: One should not praise oneself among the assemblies,
thag2.45:1.4_0: but be stable, measured in speech, and true to your vows.
thag2.45:2.1_0: For one who sees the meaning so very subtle and fine,
thag2.45:2.2_0: who is skilled in thought and humble in manner,
